Text saved: The talk was very interesting. The speaker said some true things. For example, she talked about parents. She talked about what children learn from them.

Teenagers see their parents do things. They see them use social media when they cook. Or they see them use it at a red light. So, teenagers also text when they do their homework. We cannot be surprised by this.

She also said another true thing. People want to be in many places at the same time. So they change between talking in real life and talking online. I see this with my daughter and her friends. They plan to meet. Then they sit together. But they do not talk. Each person talks to someone different online.
